content: endless light cowl materials yarn any medium weight yarn will work crochet hook any hook will work i used a i hook for my example cowl 5 0 mm scissors stitch markers crochet stitches needed chain chain stitch st skip skip double_crochet stitch double_crochet video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here double_crochet v_stitch double_crochet v video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here endless light cowl pattern make chains in the multiple of 3 i made 183 chains for my example cowl row 1 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet into the 3rd chain from your hook *skip 2 chs 1 double_crochet v into the next chain repeat from * until you only have 2 chain left make 1 double_crochet into that last chain row 2 chain 3 counts as 1 double_crochet make 1 double_crochet v into each previous double_crochet v across make 1 double_crochet into the top of the last chs in this row to complete repeat row 2 for how wide you want your cowl i made 15 row for my example cowl fasten_off video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here sew up the ends of your cowl ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ you can view this free pattern on my blog here playlist featuring more free cowl patterns here ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ follow crochet me lovely on all social media @crochetmelovely if you want to learn new stitches and techniques subscribe to my youtube channel here find more patterns on my blog here if you have any questions about this pattern email me at crochetmelovely@yahoo com thank you for downloading this pattern enjoy
